title: Bovine colostrum as a promising nutraceutical: a systematic review
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3FB00256J, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Akshay Ramani, Sathiya Taherabbas, Subhadip Manik
Sustainable living and nutritional food are paramount in the current era of expanding population. This systematic review explores bovine colostrum-first milk produced by mammals’ post-parturition that shows a unique composition and multifaceted health benefits than mature milk.
